pullRequest.title: set all cache connector to https and code refactoring
pullRequest.bodyText:
All cache connectors use now https addresses.
This needs to reflect in our code base.
Additionally, I did some refactoring to have all connectors in own package dirs with a package-info.

commit.message:
set all cache connector to https and code refactoring

All cache connectors use now https addresses.
This needs to reflect in our code base.

Additionally, I did some refactoring to have all connectors in own package dirs with a package-info.

nodes.bodyText: As part of general cleanup and since you touched this code anyway - shouldn't this method be renamed from getHttps to isHttps? Since it's returning trivial boolean value and that's the common convention to use is... for bool methods...

For gc.su connector in similar place I was using connector.getHttps() which IMO more transparent than bare true value and also it's better for maintainability as you won't need to update in everywhere if something changes..
a bit of off-topic, but www is also obsolete now and can be removed :)

commit.message:
- change to https on tests for geocaching.su
- remove www on geocaching.su
- rename getHttps to isHttps because of its boolean return
- set cache url depending of https state for geopeidus
